# Harpy
Harpies are an avian human mutation, sprouting feathered wings and ruffled tails. They see the world through an ultraviolet view, slash with their claws dealing [color=#ec3a3a]piercing [/color]damage, and walk around on digitrade legs.
## Sing your heart out
Harpies are capable of singing out a tune on the spot with their voice, allowing for you to play music wherever you are, as long as you aren't muffled
